title: CATIA Training
description: Mindmajix CATIA training provides a strong foundation of CATIA from scratch with real-world examples. It enables you to master the fundamentals of advanced modeling techniques, sketcher tools, base features, surface design workbench, etc., through real-time use cases and projects, and also prepares you for clearing the CATIA certification exam.
prerequisites:
What will you learn in this CATIA training?After the successful completion of CATIA training at Mindmajix, you will be able to:

Get an overview of the functionality of CATIA, and its key features.
Use the Sketcher tools to draw the sketches in the Sketcher Workbench.
Get an overview of concepts of parts modelling, surface modelling & Sheet metal modelling.
Work with wireframe and surface design workbench.
Gain knowledge of advanced modelling tools used in CATIA.
instructor_bio: Asheel has got 5+ of years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.

content: ['Introduction to CATIA', 'Introduction to Sketcher', 'Drawing Sketches in Sketcher Workbench', 'Creating Base Features', 'Creating Advanced Features', 'Surface and Wireframe Design', 'Creating Surfaces', 'Editing Surfaces', 'Surface and Wireframe Design', 'Introduction to Assembly Design', 'Bottom up Assembly Approach', 'Top Down Assembly approach', 'Engineering Drawing', 'Drawing in Catia', 'Annotation in CATIA Drawing', 'CATIA Drawing Practices', 'Sheetmetal', 'Practice Test & Interview Questions']
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified CATIA Professionals
